property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a card in their hand. Then each player reveals their chosen card. The owner of each creature card revealed this way with the lowest mana value puts it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target land becomes a 3/3 creature that's still a land.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: David Martin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step. Attacking creatures become blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Realizing they weren't getting past the fog, the elves did the only thing they could do: wait.

property.value: The one you see is just a diversion.

property.value: Carl Critchlow

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fading 7 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with seven fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) Remove a fade counter from Saproling Burst: Create a green Saproling creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on Saproling Burst." When Saproling Burst leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens created with Saproling Burst. They can't be regenerated.
